name: RPG Response Policy
description: Response policy for RPG/roleplay chat sessions. Checks for all four failure modes with standard thresholds.

operations.name: Timeout Detection
operations.description: Detects null/empty responses from LLM timeout or connection drop.

operations.name: Recursive Loop Detection
operations.description: Detects repeated text blocks (50-char window, 3x threshold).

operations.name: Wrong Character Detection
operations.description: Detects LLM responding as the user character instead of the system character.

operations.name: Refusal Detection
operations.description: Detects LLM safety refusals within configured rating (2+ phrase matches).
